sentence: Two quarters through the new fiscal year, P&G is optimistic about the business.
In fact, executives raised their sales growth target to 2.5% from 2%, compared to the 1% uptick in 2016 and the flat result in the prior year.
In part because of the economic challenges mentioned above, they left their earnings forecast unchanged.
Still, the projected 5% profit uptick would be the first time in three fiscal years that P&G has hit its long-run earnings growth target.
